name: Cherub Garden :]
description:
Use the mouse to interact with your Garden and it's inhabitants.

- Full Screen is recommended

Create Cherubs from Trees and manage their stats to help them grow! 

Focus on maxing out one stat, and that Cherub will eventually grow to a point where you can Transform it into a Tree that will grow resources to benefit that stat.

Then try maxing out a different stat on a new Cherub to see what kinds of trees you can get!

*See what happens if you neglect feeding a cherub...

Music: Sonic Adventure 2 - Chao Garden (Neutral)
